1.4.title: Ensure no 'root' user account access key exists

1.5.title: Ensure MFA is enabled for the 'root' user account

1.8.title: Ensure IAM password policy requires minimum length of 14 or greater

1.9.title: Ensure IAM password policy requires at least one uppercase letter

1.10.title: Ensure IAM password policy requires at least one lowercase letter

1.11.title: Ensure IAM password policy requires at least one number and symbol

1.12.title: Ensure credentials unused for 90 days or greater are disabled

1.13.title: Ensure there is only one active access key available for any single IAM user

1.14.title: Ensure access keys are rotated every 90 days or less

1.16.title: Ensure IAM policies that allow full administrative privileges are not attached

2.1.1.title: Ensure S3 Bucket Policy is set to deny HTTP requests

2.1.2.title: Ensure S3 bucket access logging is enabled on the CloudTrail S3 bucket

2.1.3.title: Ensure the S3 bucket used to store CloudTrail logs is not publicly accessible

2.1.5.title: Ensure that S3 Buckets are configured with 'Block public access'

2.3.1.title: Ensure that encryption is enabled for RDS instances

2.3.2.title: Ensure that public access is not given to RDS instance

2.3.3.title: Ensure that RDS clusters and instances have deletion protection enabled

2.3.4.title: Ensure that RDS automated backups are enabled

2.3.5.title: Ensure that RDS instances use Multi-AZ

3.1.title: Ensure CloudTrail is enabled in all regions

3.2.title: Ensure CloudTrail log file validation is enabled

3.3.title: Ensure the S3 bucket used to store CloudTrail logs is not publicly accessible

3.7.title: Ensure CloudTrail logs are encrypted at rest using KMS CMKs

3.9.title: Ensure VPC flow logging is enabled in all VPCs

5.1.title: Ensure no Network ACLs allow ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 to remote server administration ports

5.2.title: Ensure no security groups allow ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 to port 22

5.3.title: Ensure no security groups allow ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 to port 3389

5.4.title: Ensure the default security group of every VPC restricts all traffic
